name: Muskatusk's Marauders
description:
Muskatusk's Marauders is a 2D Platformer created in Unity by a team of 5 in the Spring of 2019.  The team was driven by their integration of  pixel animations.  While this game remains unfinished (you will just run off the edge of the map at the end), there are some great details to pay attention to in this adventure.

Team:

Jason B - Programming

Hazel D - Art/Animation

Dan Q - Art

Noah L - Design and Art

Jay L - Programming and Design

How to Play:

WASD  to Move

Z to Attack

Up Arrow to Jump
